thread.title: Tom Cruise Not Invited to Daughter's Wedding
thread.title_full: Tom Cruise Not Invited to Daughter's Wedding

title: Tom Cruise Not Invited to Daughter's Wedding
text:
Photos File Photo of Tom Cruise | AP 
LOS ANGELES:Hollywood actor Tom Cruise didn't attend his adopted daughter Isabella Cruise's secret wedding last month because he didn't get any invitation, sources have said.According to sources, Tom covered the bill for the couple's nuptials and party which took place at the fancy schmancy Dorchester hotel, reports tmz.com.Multiple sources told the website that Isabella and her now-husband Max Parker wanted a low-key wedding with a small circle of friends only. Hence, both of them didn't invite their parents. It explained why her mother Nicole Kidman, who was in London at the time the wedding took place, didn't attend the wedding either. Though Nicole wasn't invited, she was "overjoyed" at her daughter's new union. Regarding the couple's decision to limit their guest list, the "Mission: Impossible Rogue Nation" actor was reportedly cool with it.
